code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function VideoUpload(){const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const[video,setVideo]=useState(null);const handleChange=e=>{setVideo(e.target.files[0]);console.log("Selected video:",e.target.files[0]);};const handleUpload=async()=>{if(!video)return alert("Please select a video");const formData=new FormData();formData.append("video",video);console.log(" Uploading...");const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/analyze",{method:"POST",body:formData});const data=await res.json();console.log(" Response from backend:",data);setResult(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"video/*",onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpload,style:{marginLeft:"10px"},children:"Analyze"}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(result,null,2)})]});}export default VideoUpload;
